name: Fort Snow
description:
Fort Snow is a fantasy bullet hell survivor developed for Centennial College's Game Studio Practicum class. Follow young Jackie Snow in the fight to free the world plagued by evil snowmen before they can terrorize the village.

Team Members Arthur Senna - Lead Programmer Kurtis Kennedy - Game Designer / Programmer Qingcheng "Kelly" Lin - Lead Artist / Animator Sebastian Escorcio - UI Artist / Programmer Veronica "Roni" Bierwirth - Audio Designer / Writer / Programmer
